Package de.mycrocast.android.sdk.core

Class Mycrocast

java.lang.Object
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.core.Mycrocast
public final class Mycrocast extends Object
Entry point to access the different parts of the android sdk. The first step before anything else is done is to initialize the sdk with your customer credentials

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(String apiKey, String customerToken, android.content.SharedPreferences preferences)
      Initialise the sdk with your customer information
      Parameters:
      apiKey - - your api key
      customerToken - - your customer token
      preferences - - android preferences

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(String apiKey, String customerToken, android.content.SharedPreferences preferences, int maxDelayInSeconds)
      Initialise the sdk with your customer information
      Parameters:
      apiKey - - your api key
      customerToken - - your customer token
      preferences - - android preferences
      maxDelayInSeconds - - maximum delay while playing a livestream in seconds

    • getLiveStreamContainer

      @NonNull public static LiveStreamContainer getLiveStreamContainer()
      Returns:
      the LiveStreamContainer to interact with the live streams

    • getLiveStreamRefresher

      @Nullable public static LiveStreamRefresher getLiveStreamRefresher()
      Can only be null, if you did not initialize the sdk before accessing this.
      Returns:
      the live stream refresher

    • getLiveStreamRater

      @NonNull public static LiveStreamRater getLiveStreamRater()
      Returns:
      the live stream rater

    • getListenerState

      @NonNull public static LiveStreamListenerState getListenerState()
      Returns:
      the live stream listener state

    • getChat

      @NonNull public static Chat getChat()
      Getter for the interaction for anything related to the chat
      Returns:
      - the chat interface

    • getErrorReceiving

      @NonNull public static ErrorReceiving getErrorReceiving()
      Returns:
      the interface, that can be used for receiving error message provided by the sdk

    • getLiveStreamListenerFactory

      @Nullable public static LiveStreamListenerFactory getLiveStreamListenerFactory()
      Can only be null, if you did not initialize the sdk before accessing this.
      Returns:
      the factory, that can be used for creating a LiveStreamListener for a specific livestream.

    • terminate

      public static void terminate()
      Terminates the sdk.
